-1.title: Johnny's Big Decision
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: What do you do after death and destruction have befallen the earth, and turned it into a smoldering wasteland? You watch to Johnny Franks on Active Radioactive Radio. Because - what else are you gonna do? The comedic post-apocalyptic variety show audio drama that became a webseries, thanks to generous Kickstarter backers. Season One (Episodes 1-3): Lonely verbose host Johnny Franks introduces you to his friends in Leffdon, who are at each other's throats as the threat of Lotus looms over them all. Johnny confronts his fears, his friends reach an understanding, and Lotus had no idea what she was in for.
